name: Wise Escape From Prison (현명한 감옥 탈출기)
name_original: Wise Escape From Prison (현명한 감옥 탈출기)
description:
This game is made by Korean TEENS!
--------------------------------------------------------

In prison where aliens crashed,
people are infected with unknown viruses except you!

Escape from prison by throwing THE STONE!
This game is 'UP&DOWN shooting GAME'.
